perturbation.original_text: In implementing its obligations under this Agreement, Pfizer, without charge or expense to Exact (other than as expressly set forth in Sections 3.6 and 4.2(c) of this Agreement), shall provide facilities, personnel (including management and Sales Representatives) and other resources as Pfizer, in its reasonable discretion but not inconsistent with the express terms of this Agreement, believes necessary.
perturbation.changed_text: In implementing its obligations under this Agreement, Pfizer, without charge or expense to Exact (other than as expressly set forth in Sections 3.6 and 4.2(c) of this Agreement), *may* provide facilities, personnel (including management and Sales Representatives) and other resources as Pfizer, in its reasonable discretion but not inconsistent with the express terms of this Agreement, believes necessary.
perturbation.explanation: By changing 'shall' to 'may', Pfizer's obligation to provide necessary resources becomes discretionary, creating uncertainty in enforcement. The original text enforces pfizer to provide facilities, while the modified text gives an option for pfizer to give facilities.

perturbation.original_text: During the Term, as between the Parties, Exact shall remain solely responsible, at its expense , except as expressly otherwise provided in this Agreement, for all activities and liabilities that the owner and Regulatory Approval holder of an FDA approved medical device would normally have, including, in each case with respect to the Territory, the following: (i) manufacturing, in accordance with the QSR and Applicable Law (including conducting all quality assurance testing) sufficient quantities of Product to meet market demand therefore;
perturbation.changed_text: During the Term, as between the Parties, Exact may remain solely responsible, at its expense , except as expressly otherwise provided in this Agreement, for all activities and liabilities that the owner and Regulatory Approval holder of an FDA approved medical device would normally have, including, in each case with respect to the Territory, the following: (i) manufacturing, in accordance with the QSR and Applicable Law (including conducting all quality assurance testing) sufficient quantities of Product to meet market demand therefore;
perturbation.explanation: The term 'shall remain solely responsible' is changed to 'may remain solely responsible,' it is unclear if Exact is legally obligated to fullfil all activities and liabilities. The original text obligates Exact to remain responsible, while the modified text gives an option for exact to take responsibilities.
perturbation.location: 3.2 Responsibility for Product (b) Exact Product Responsibilities

perturbation.original_text: Each Party shall be legally responsible and liable for the actions, omissions and conduct of their respective Sales Representatives and other Representatives performing activities hereunder. Each Party shall ensure that all Persons for whom they have legal responsibility and liability in accordance with the foregoing sentence comply with all Applicable Laws, the AdvaMed Code or the PhRMA Code, as applicable, Applicable Compliance/Review Polices, and all requirements of this Agreement, and shall implement and maintain policies and procedures to ensure such compliance.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Party is encouraged to be legally responsible and liable for the actions, omissions and conduct of their respective Sales Representatives and other Representatives performing activities hereunder. Each Party should ensure that all Persons for whom they have legal responsibility and liability in accordance with the foregoing sentence comply with all Applicable Laws, the AdvaMed Code or the PhRMA Code, as applicable, Applicable Compliance/Review Polices, and all requirements of this Agreement, and could implement and maintain policies and procedures to ensure such compliance.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'shall be legally responsible' is changed to 'is encouraged to be legally responsible'. Also, the term 'shall ensure' is changed to 'should ensure' and 'shall implement' is changed to 'could implement'. The changes modify the obligation of ensuring legal responsibility and implementing compliance, making it difficult to enforce.
